main event: Multiple military personnel observed a large rectangular object and several smaller silver objects descending and fluttering over a military base.
interesting points: The large object was described as the size of a Jeep at approximately 15,000 feet,The smaller objects fell in a fluttering manner and the larger object followed in a stabilized descent,The objects were silver with clashes of red paint,The sighting lasted for about 6 minutes,All five witnesses provided consistent reports regarding the characteristics of the objects.
sighted object: a large rectangular object and several smaller silver objects
witness description: military personnel including Majors and Captains from the USAF
